#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
using namespace std;
#define mx 2000000000
typedef long long ll;

ll pow[100],sum[100],cou=0;

void power(void){
    ll cur=1,la;
    pow[0]=1;
    for(la=1;la<=100000;la++){
        if(cur>mx)
            break;
        cou++;
        pow[la]=cur;
        cur*=2;
    }
    for(la=1;la<=cou;la++)
        sum[la]=pow[la]+sum[la-1];
}

int main()
{
    power();
    int t,la;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--){
        ll n;
        la=1;
        scanf("%lld",&n);
        while(sum[la]<n)
            la++;
        ll ans=sum[la];
        ll cou=pow[la];
        ll rem=(n-cou);
        ans+=rem*2;
        printf("%lld\n",ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
